          <title>
            <string language="en">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Destillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distillation</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destilación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how water can be separated from a salt solution through evaporation and condensation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beaker</string>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Wasser von einer 
Salzlösung durch Verdampfung und Kondensation getrennt werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'eau peut être 
séparée d'une solution de sel par l'évaporation et la condensation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a água pode ser 
separada de uma solução de sal com a evaporação e a condensação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'acqua può 
essere separata da una soluzione salina con evaporazione e 
condensazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το ύδωρ μπορεί να 
χωριστεί από μια αλατισμένη λύση μέσω της εξάτμισης και της 
συμπύκνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el agua se puede 
separar de una solución de sal con la evaporación y la 
condensación.</string>
          </description>
